name: For Runner Night
description:
Welcome to the world of For Runner Night and get ready for the challenges

Game features:

For Runner Night is a single player endless runner game in which the player will be able to run between obstacles and jump, where he will have to dodge as many obstacles as possible, where the player can always try to beat his own record for the longest distance covered.

Main features:
- 1 player offline!
- Always keep avoiding obstacles, otherwise you will go back to the beginning.
- An offline local player!
- There is a tutorial available in the game's menu to teach new players about the game's commands.
- Control not supported!
- A character named Riley Bloom
